price: Bagira bati “Nimuzindukire mu murima wanyu niba mugikomeje umugambi wo kuwusarura. ”
arabic: أَنِ ٱغۡدُواْ عَلَىٰ حَرۡثِكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰرِمِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: ani igh'dū ʿalā ḥarthikum in kuntum ṣārimīna
